title: Differentiable Neural Computer (LIVE)
excerpt: The Differentiable Neural Computer is an awesome model that DeepMind recently released. It's a memory augmented network that can perform meta-learning (learning to learn). We'll go over it's architecture details and implement it ourselves in Tensorflow.   Code for this video: https://github.com/llSourcell/differentiable_neural_computer
